text: واغفر لابى انه كان من الضالين

translations.translation: and forgive my father - he was one of the misguided;
Forgive me and my father: He was surely among those who went astray.
and forgive my father for he is among those who strayed,
Forgive my father. He has gone astray.
“And forgive my father* – he is indeed astray.” (His paternal uncle)
And forgive my father, verily, he is of the erring.
And forgive my father, for surely he is of those who have gone astray;
and forgive my father, for he is one of those astray.
And forgive my father. Lo! he is of those who err.
and forgive my father; for he is one of the misguided;
And forgive my father; verily he is of the erring.
Forgive my father, for he is one of those who are astray.
Forgive my father, for that he is among those astray;
And forgive my father, verily he is of the erring;
and forgive my father, for he was among the astray.
And forgive my father—he was one of the misguided.
And forgive my father. Indeed, he has been of those astray.

[26:86] And forgive my father, for indeed he is one of those who are astray, by Your relenting to him and forgiving him: this was before it became clear to him [Abraham] that he [his father] was an enemy of God, as mentioned in sūrat Barā’a [Q. 9:114].
(And forgive my father) and guide my father through me. (Lo! he is of those who err) he is in error, a disbeliever.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَٱغْفِرْ لأَبِيۤ } واعفُ عن زلته وذنوبه إن سبقت عنايتك له في سابق قضائك وحضرة علمك { إِنَّهُ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ } [الشعراء: 86] التائهين في تيه الغفلة والغرور
